ComicInfo.Title: Part 4; The Abyss Stares Back
ComicInfo.Summary:
Magnus confronts her own personal demons as she visits a shady acquaintance - someone who knows her from back when she was better known as Magnus: Robot Hunter! - as the past and present collide while she's searching for a lead to track down her prey: a deadly, homicidal AI who's still on the loose!
Will she be able to shake the specter of the past and capture the rogue AI before someone else is hurt?
Also: Doc Spektor, Part 4! The story of the all-new master (and we use the term lightly) sorcerer continues...when Doc plays shrink - and both literally (and metaphysically) GETS INSIDE a client's head!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Giuseppe Camuncoli & José Villarrubia | 1 | B | Cover B | Jorge Fornes | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Giuseppe Camuncoli | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jorge Fornes | 4 |
